name: stardew-villager-query
description: This app is to help query the different gifts each villager loves, likes, neutral, dislikes, and hates in Stardew Valley.

scripts.frontend: cd frontend && cd stardew-valley-search && npx expo start
scripts.migrate: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env production
scripts.seed: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env production
